Louvre Abu Dhabi

  • While at Ateliers Jean Nouvel, I worked on the typographic signage and icon design for the Louvre Abu Dhabi museum under the the creative direction of Philippe Apeloig and Clovis Vallois.
  • To accompany the building's unique design, Philippe Apeloig had devised a system using the dome's light patterns. The challenge was to make the icons understandable from every culture.
